charges.charge_description: Knowingly and unlawfully enter for the purpose of bank robbery, in that on May 17, 1996, Matthew Martin Leary, entered the First Citizens Bank (FCB), 2109 Avent Ferry Road, Raleigh, Wake County, North Carolina, and did knowingly and unlawfully, and by force, violence, and intimidation, take from employees of FCB lawful currency of the United States, to wit: $15,000.00 belonging to and in the care, control, custody and possession of FCB. The FCB, 2109 Avent Ferry Road, Raleigh, North Carolina, is insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) Certificagte Number 11063-9, dated April 26, 1974; in violation of 18 USC, Sec 213(a)(Bank Robbery)
